job description:
Top Must Haves:
NGS (Next-Generation Sequencing)
Ph.D. (Molecular Biology or other Life Science)
Some management experience
CLIA (preferred)

LAB MANAGER
Reports to: Chief Technology Officer

Summary:
We are looking for a highly motivated, well organized and detail-oriented lab technical manager to set up our next generation sequencing (NGS) CLIA/CAP laboratory and manage 5 direct reports.

Essential Functions
  • Set up a CLIA/CAP NGS laboratory with supervision;
  • Supervise lab technicians to run Next generation sequencing (NGS) assay which can be transferred from clients or internal R&D group in a CLIA/CAP lab
  • Develop customized assays for customers by supervising a scientist focusing single cell sequencing and other advanced NGS assays
  • Lab daily operation
  • Sample managements for clients
  • DNA/RNA extractions, QC, and reporting
  • Validate NGS assays and write validation reports
  • Work with IT and QA for data managements
  • Work with QA manager to ensure the lab staff cross trained according CLIA/CAP compliance with other lab sites within the company
  • Work with lab QA manager to keep the lab complied
  • Prepare auditing documents.
